column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Wu says : " Once we 're done with these , we can go into the Middle Ring and I 'll let you pick out some new suits , then we 'll hit the boutiques in the Upper Ring for me .
#Text=Kuvira is my hero .
#Text=" Girl # 2 says : " They 're selling them over there .
#Text=" Wu says : " You ca n't sell that junk in here !
#Text=This is the Little Ba Sing Se Fashion Mall , and I 'm the Little King here !
#Text=Respect the brooch !
#Text=" Crowd says : " Stop it , Little King !
#Text=" Wu says : " I am the Glorious Defender !
#Text=" Crowd says : " I 'm covered in juice !
#Text=Get him !
#Text=" Mako says : " We need to get you out of here .
#Text=" Wu says : " It 's destiny .
#Text=Look where we are , Mako !
#Text=The Royal Palace .
#Text=" Little Boy says : " Hey !
#Text=It 's my birthday !
#Text=" Wu says : " It 's my coronation day !
#Text=You 'll have another birthday next year , but I 'll never have this day back again !
#Text=Never !
#Text=" Mako says : " Okay , you 're losing it .
#Text=" Wu says : " This is the worst day of my life !
#Text=" Mako says : " Why ?
#Text=Do you really want to be the king ?
#Text=I mean , Kuvira might be a power - crazed dictator , but at least she spent the last few years working hard to make the Earth Kingdom somewhat better .
#Text=If you were an Earth Kingdom citizen , do you think you 're the kind of person you want as your king ?
#Text=What have you ever done for your people ?
#Text=I 'm sorry , that was out of line .
#Text=" Wu says : " No , you 're right .
#Text=No one ever talked to me like that before .
#Text=I guess I 'm just a joke who got what he deserved .
#Text=" Mako says : " Let 's get you out of here and back to someplace safe .
#Text=" Wu says : " Carry me ?
#Text=" Mako says : " No .
#Text="
